# Government Tender Announcement: RFSO for Low Dose X-Ray Body Scanners

## Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of Low Dose X-Ray Full Body Scanners to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC). Interested bidders are required to submit a bid by 14:00 EST on February 28, 2024.

## Tender Details
*   Tender Reference Number: WS4102295049-Doc4245357371
*   Tender Title: Request for Standing Offer for Low Dose X-Ray Body Scanners
*   Closing Date and Time: February 28, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: July 22, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2028

## Description of the Requirement
The CSC requires a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply and delivery of Low Dose X-Ray Full Body Scanners, as well as provision of spare parts, training, and services (installations, maintenance, and repair) on an as-and-when-required basis. The scanners will be used for screening inmates for contraband items at correctional facilities across Canada.

## Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
Bidders must demonstrate the ability to fulfill the requirements outlined in the RFSO. The selection criteria include the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. Interested bidders must be registered on the Procurement Data System.

## Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) and other documents specified, can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC) at [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Tel.: None.

## Important Notes
*   Bidders are not required to submit the bid or any supporting documentation through Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys.
*   Bidders must submit the bid and supporting documentation in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFSO.
*   The tender closing time is 14:00 EST on February 28, 2024.
